\section{Solr Index}
\label{\detokenize{content/solr_index:solr-index}}\label{\detokenize{content/solr_index::doc}}
This section covers building the Apache Solr index to hold summarization data.


\subsection{Creating The Core}
\label{\detokenize{content/solr_index:creating-the-core}}
The core is automatically created when the docker container is initialized.
A python script \sphinxstyleemphasis{create\_index.py} automatically tries to create the core and exits without error if the core already exists.

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\},numbers=left,firstnumber=1,stepnumber=1]
    \PYG{k}{while} \PYG{n}{retry}\PYG{p}{:}
        \PYG{k}{try}\PYG{p}{:}
            \PYG{n}{sys}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{stdout}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{write}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{Creating index }\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{summaries}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{...}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
            \PYG{n}{response} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{request}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{urlopen}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{urljoin}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{args}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{base\PYGZus{}url}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{/solr/admin/cores?action=CREATE\PYGZam{}name=summaries}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{)}
            \PYG{n}{retry} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{k+kc}{False}
            \PYG{n}{sys}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{stdout}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{write}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{ok.}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{k}{except} \PYG{n}{HTTPError} \PYG{k}{as} \PYG{n}{e}\PYG{p}{:}
            \PYG{n}{sys}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{stdout}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{write}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{Index already exists, will exit...}\PYG{l+s+se}{\PYGZbs{}n}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)}

            \PYG{n}{sleep}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+m+mi}{5}\PYG{p}{)}
            \PYG{n}{retries} \PYG{o}{+}\PYG{o}{=} \PYG{l+m+mi}{1}

            \PYG{k}{if} \PYG{n}{retries} \PYG{o}{\PYGZgt{}} \PYG{l+m+mi}{10}\PYG{p}{:}
